DOC.brief_summary: GoldenCare copper intravaginal device may useful treatment symptomatic bacterial Vaginosis ( BV ) . Standard treatment BV metronidazole . Although reported cure rate high 90 % , recurrence rate 58 % 12 month . The study hypothesis GoldenCare cure BV . This proof concept study collect preliminary evidence safety efficacy GoldenCare .

DOC.criteria: Written inform consent Female age 18 year old Subject clinical bacterial Vaginosis 4 4 positive Amsel 's criterion Negative pregnancy test For 7 day treatment period , subject agree refrain use douche intravaginal product ( i.e . feminine deodorant spray , spermicide , Nonoxynol9 product , tampon , condom ) . Subject also agree refrain take oral intravaginal antibiotic ( unless enrol comparator arm ) , antifungal agent entire study period . Subject another infectious noninfectious cause vulvovaginitis asymptomatic candidiasis , Trichomonas vaginalis , Chlamydia trachomatis , Neisseria gonorrhoeae , Herpes simplex , human papilloma virus , atrophic vaginitis , lichen sclerosus , genital wart .
